summary: There\'s a bug where Alduin\'s Stormcall sound effect can play forever, until you start a new game. Since this was breaking the game for a few people, I created this mod to fix it. It\'ll make Alduin\'s Stormcall silent, but that\'s a minor price to pay for keeping your save.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/13796-1-1377526849.png[/img]

There\'s a bug where Alduin\'s Stormcall sound effect can play forever, until you start a new game. Since this was breaking the game for a few people, I created this mod to fix it. It\'ll make Alduin\'s Stormcall silent, but that\'s a minor price to pay for keeping your save.

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/13796-1-1377518866.png[/img]

Due to a request, this mod is here to stay.

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/13796-1-1377518866.png[/img]
author: Rennn
